functions.name: Start
functions.desc: This method gets called whenever you receive the Item

functions.name: Equipped
functions.desc: Called whenever you equipp the item

functions.name: Update
functions.desc: Called every frame while the item is equipped

params.name: deltaTime
params.desc: The gap of time between each rendered frame

functions.name: Unequipped
functions.desc: Called whenever you unequipp the item

functions.name: Destroy
functions.desc: Called when the item is removed from your inventory

functions.name: DataChanged
functions.desc: Called whenever the custom data of the item it is holding changes

params.name: dataIndex
params.desc: The index of the data that was changed

params.name: newValue
params.desc: The new value to which the data was changed

functions.name: GetData
functions.desc: Gets the custom data of the item by the index

params.name: dataIndex
params.lua_type: string The key for the required custom data

returns.desc: The data that is contained in the index

functions.name: SetData
functions.desc:
[WARN]

Changing data on the client side won't affect the server-side version of this item

params.name: dataIndex
params.desc: The key for the required custom data

functions.name: CastPosition
functions.desc: Casts from camera to the middle of your screen

params.name: respectCanCollide
params.desc: If it should ignore instances that have collisions turned off

params.name: ignoreList
params.desc: The instances that should be ignored by the raycast

returns.desc: The hit of the camera raycast

functions.name: Drop
functions.desc: You can call this method to drop your item

functions.name: PlayAnimation
functions.desc: This plays an animation that you fed into the weapon data with its given index

functions.name: IsEquipped
functions.desc: Checks if the item attached to this lifecycle is equipped or not

functions.name: _StopActionAnimations
functions.desc: Stops all action animations

functions.name: _StopCoreAnimations
functions.desc: Stops all the core animations

functions.name: _ChangeCore
functions.desc: Changes the core animation that should be played

functions.name: _ActivateCore
functions.desc: Activate core animation

functions.name: _ChangeEquippedState
functions.desc: Changes the equip state

functions.name: _Clear
functions.desc: Clears the connections of this lifecycle

functions.name: _LoadAnimations
functions.desc: Loads and caches animations

params.name: targetStore
params.desc: The cache on which it should be stored

functions.name: _SetListeners
functions.desc: Sets the listeners to change the animation state of the player

functions.name: _SetAnimator
functions.desc: Do not call this method. It is used to manage the player animations

name: ItemLifeCycle
desc:
ItemLifeCycles are classes that are used to give behavior to your items. The get attached to any item you wish
and manage it thru events that get called upon certain actions. This lifecycle was inspired in Roact's lifecycle tree
